name: 7. QUINOA AND LENTIL SALAD
preparation: Prepare lentils and quinoa (optional). Soak lentils (100g) in water for 8-10 hours (let it soak at night). Wash the quinoa (100g) in water until the water runs clear. Now soak it in water for 30 minutes.

Preparation. Put the lentils in a pin and 1 spoon of salt and 2 cups of water. Bring the water to boil and then reduce heat to mid level for 5-10 minutes. Take the lentils out of the pin and let them dry. Squeeze some lemon, add some olive oil and let them marinate for a few minutes.

Make tha salad. - Prepare the spices: 1 spoon of paprika, 1, spoon of cumin, ½ spoon of cayenne pepper (optional)- Cut 1 onion and 200g of carrots in small pieces and add them to a pin with olive oil.- Add some salt. Heat at mid level for 5-6 minutes, until the onions and the carrots are lightly browned. - Add some grated garlic (1 spoon) and heat it for 1 minute. Reduce heat to low-medium. - - Now add tomato paste (3 spoon)- Add the spices to the pin and mix all together (1 or 2 minutes) at low heat. - Add the quinoa on top of it and 1 cup of vegetable broth (or water)- Bring it to high heat to get to a vigorous boil, then reduce the heat to low and cook for ~20 minutes.

Finishing touches. Add the lentils on top of the salad. Optionals: cut some parsley and 1 onion and add them to the salad. Add some pepper and some mint. Now mix it all together and leave it there for 5 minutes. Enjoy.
